<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header>
      <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title>Tab 2 test</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>
    <ion-content :fullscreen="true">
      <ion-header collapse="condense">
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-title size="large">Tab 2</ion-title>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>
      
      <!-- <ExploreContainer name="Tab 2 page test" /> -->
      <!-- ---------- -->
              <l-map :zoom="13" :center="[50.9223,11.5723]" :options="{zoomControl: false}">
                <l-tile-layer style="z-index: 100" url="http://{s}.tile.osm.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"></l-tile-layer>


              </l-map>
      <!-- ----------- -->
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';
import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent } from '@ionic/vue';
// import ExploreContainer from '@/components/ExploreContainer.vue';
import "leaflet/dist/leaflet.css"
// import { LMap, LGeoJson } from "@vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet";

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'Tab2Page',
  components: { IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonPage },
  // async created() {
  //   const {data: events, error} = await this.$supabase
  //     .from('events')
  //     .select('coordinates')
  //   this.populate_markers_array(events)
  //   this.loaded = true
  //   // console.log(this.markers1);
  //   // this.cut = this.markers1.replace("", "");
  // },
  data: () => ({
    spot: false,
    zoomControl: false,
    loaded: true,
    markers: [],
  }),
  methods: {
    // greet: function (event) {
    //   this.spot = true;
    // },
    populate_markers_array: function (marker_objects) {
      let markersArr = []
      marker_objects.forEach(element => {
        let coordsArr = element.coordinates.split(',')
        markersArr.push([parseFloat(coordsArr[0]), parseFloat(coordsArr[1])])
      });
      this.markers = markersArr

      // simple storage update
      // var storage = localStorage.getItem('myCat');
      // let newData = storage + ',' + 'Murksi'
      // window.localStorage.setItem('myCat', newData);
      // console.log(storage)
    }
  }
});
</script>

<style>
/* .overlay {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 3000;
  margin-top: 20px;
  left: 50%;
  top: 20px;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  width: 90vw;
}

.margin {
  padding-left: 10px;
  padding-right: 10px;
}

.spot {
  margin-top: -800px;
  z-index: 3000;
} */
</style>
